item.title: What is DNS and how it works in Kubernetes
item.description: What is DNS DNS, which is short for domain name system was designed aim to solve a simple but critical problem in computer networking: how to translate human-friendly domain names into IP addresses. How DNS works DNS is a distributed database, implemented in a hierarchy of name servers. There are 3 types of DNS servers: Root servers: These servers are the first step in the DNS lookup process. They are responsible for answering requests for the top-level domains (TLDs) such as .
